name: Kebabs
description: Turkey is famous for its kebabs, which are grilled or roasted meat dishes. Adana kebab, shish kebab, and doner kebab are some of the most popular types.

name: Baklava
description: Baklava is a sweet pastry that is made with layers of phyllo dough, honey, and nuts. It is a popular dessert in Turkey and is often served with tea or coffee.

name: Dolma
description: Dolma is a dish made with stuffed vegetables, such as grape leaves, eggplants, and peppers. The filling is typically made with rice, herbs, and spices.

name: Pide
description: Pide is a type of Turkish flatbread that is topped with cheese, meat, vegetables, and spices. It is often compared to pizza and is a popular street food in Turkey.

name: Meze
description: A traditional Mexican dish consisting of a corn or wheat tortilla filled with various ingredients such as beef, chicken, fish, or vegetables. It is usually served with salsa, guacamole, and other toppings.

name: Turkish Delight
description: Turkish Delight, also known as lokum, is a type of confectionery that is made with sugar, cornstarch, and flavorings. It is often flavored with rosewater or lemon and is a popular sweet treat in Turkey.
